description: It is an excellent source of antioxidant vitamin, vitamin-C.vitamin-C helps the human body develop immunity to combat infectious agents, reduce episodes of cold and cough and protect it from harmful free radicals.

The pods compose healthy amounts of vitamin-A,Vitamin-A is essential for for maintaining healthy mucosa and skin.
